remarks: The set of Cartesian products of elements from two topological bases is a basis.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)

txbas $p |- ( ( R e. TopBases /\ S e. TopBases ) -> B e. TopBases ) $.

$d S x y $.
$d x y $.
